p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: -0.8862in; margin-right: 0in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: 0.0417in; text-align: end; text-indent: 0.8862in; color: #0000ff;

div.p: GRG 19/391, State Records of South Australia, Adelaide.

Undated fragment. 'rubber' also mentioned 82.05.21 from Holtze, 84.08.06 & 84.08.31 both in Castilba eleastica (what is the correct spelling? I have it as Castilbe in the first, Castiloa in the second instance.)
War es Manihot Glaziouii, mit welchen Sie als "Rubber" Pflanze dort solchen Erfolg gehabt haben?

Was it Manihot glaziouii, that you have had so much success with there as a 'rubber' plant?
See also M to M. Holtze, 31 August 1884, and M to M. Holtze, 4 May 1888.
